page.title: 04HEALTH
page.content: If you were an older person and wanted to get out, you could go to Lingfield Centre to meet people and have company. They do needle work,craft and other art there. You can also have lunch there if you want it. Young people can go to the ST. John's Ambulance Brigade to learn First Aid. If you need a doctor there are usually four doctors at the Health Centre . If you need Home Nursing there are four nurses for this area, including one male nurse . There are two dentist. There is also the clinic in Bakers Lane where mothers take their babies and where you get foot care. There is a chemist for prescriptions. Every year Lingfield has a marathon
